channel.title: Loyalty Titles Error
channel.description:
I have just recently added loyalty title's but when I logged into my rsps testing to see whether it has worked or not, I found out it wasn't coming up with the title itself, It was coming up with "MyName" and then said "Skill 1"
[img]http://imgtool.in/img/screenshot1oyo.png[/img]
I used this tutorial/Snippet http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/350858-adding-all-loyalty-titles-19.html
I followed everything correctly and that happened ^^

item.title: Loyalty Titles Error
item.dc:creator: @LearningToCode1 LearningToCode1
item.description:
@LearningToCode1 wrote:

I have just recently added loyalty title’s but when I logged into my rsps testing to see whether it has worked or not, I found out it wasn’t coming up with the title itself, It was coming up with “MyName” and then said “Skill 1”

I used this tutorial/Snippet
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/350858-adding-all-loyalty-titles-19.html
